divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up at 2AM because the sound of a really loud helicopter went by on the beach in front of me. It looked like a black army helicopter. It was very very loud and sounded like it was going to crash actually. Then my dog wanted out and I was trying to get back to sleep and was staring out my window to the south and there was a very low and very fast flying white ball of light. It was not falling but streaking over my neighbors house and off to the east. Too fast to film! But I have been seeing these very often. They are not drones because they go so fast.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around December 16th 2011
Summary: Fast White Fireball Flying in a Straight Line FAST AND LOW!
